backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, contribution logging types, governance stubs, geo types, and includes authorization, storage, and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old contribution log entries into new format by adding an `invalidated` field and updating stored maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for UI and token operations work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files covering architecture, deployment, hooks, components, and UI updates.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document describing Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installation model, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Spec defining the complaint category suggestion system including backend storage arrays and location-based mappings.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide with prerequisites, configuration steps, and instructions for deploying Whisper to ICP.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes detailing homepage redesign decisions including hero image, overlay, contrast fixes, typography, and spacing.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines a multi‑phase development plan for Whisper, detailing deliverables, non‑goals, and architectural foundations for each phase.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry system for Secretary navigation, allowing features to register destinations for option selection, keyword routing, and deep links.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides a full manual smoke test covering instance creation, proposal moderation, issue project flows, task management, and regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Lists regression-focused smoke tests validating UI fixes, Secretary flow behavior, and base‑path deployment correctness.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_SECRETARY_FLOWS: Defines smoke tests for all Secretary assistant flows including discovery, issue reporting, keyword/deep‑link routing, and error recovery.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Specifies Whisper's visual style guidelines including color palette, typography, design principles, and accessibility rules.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root containers and loading the frontend entry script.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG asset containing the teal Whisper logo with circle and arrow-like elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, secretary navigation, and lazy-loaded pages with react-query setup.
frontend/src/components/common/EarnedPoi: Inline badge showing earned contribution points unless duplicate or zero.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, authentication-aware menus, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Styled circular wrapper component for icons with size and variant options.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Reusable spinner with optional label for loading states.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Button handling login/logout with Internet Identity and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: User dropdown menu showing profile info and logout option with avatar rendering.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating a new instance, handling geography selection, validation, submission, and contribution logging.
County selector that loads counties by state, handles loading and errors, and emits selected county.
Dropdown to choose a place within a county, loading place data and handling errors and disabled states.
Dropdown to select a U.S. state, fetching state data and showing loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Ev: UI for uploading evidence files and logging contribution events, with validation, error handling, and earned-points feedback.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue‑project details with tabs for overview, tasks, and evidence, loading proposal data and geography info.
Task list and creation UI for issue projects, including task mutations and contribution logging with inline feedback.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing detailed proposal information with live data loading and optional automatic opening of the Issue Project view.
Displays a list of proposals with loading, error, empty states, refresh handling, and opens a detail dialog on selection or navigation events.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Renders a dismissible UI card prompting users to open the Secretary assistant.
Provides a searchable typeahead input for selecting a location with keyboard navigation and selectable options.
Implements the Secretary chat widget, handling user messages, assistant responses, brain actions, and location selections.
Creates a portal wrapper for rendering the Secretary widget into an overlay root with open/close management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Loads and caches the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContributionL: Fetches paginated admin-only contribution logs using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserContribut: Fetches contribution logs for a specific user principal with admin-only access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminWspTokenOpera: Provides admin mutations for minting and burning WSP tokens with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerContribution: Retrieves the caller's contribution summary from the backend using the current identity.
Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile with identity-scoped caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Fetches complaint category suggestions and full category lists based on hierarchy level using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributionEventL: Logs user contribution events with deduping, error normalization, and cache updates for rewards and summaries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Checks instance-name availability and submits new instance proposals with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the SPA’s current path by listening to popstate events for navigation changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a value by a delay to reduce rapid updates, often for search inputs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Deletes a proposal and invalidates moderation and proposal queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Hides a proposal and refreshes moderation and proposal caches afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
Manages fetching, creating, and updating proposal tasks with optimistic updates and error handling.
Custom React hook syncing state with localStorage, with SSR guards and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches and maps backend moderation queue proposals into UI-friendly moderation items.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and exposes ready/error state, resetting when src changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, proposals, roles, and geography data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages chat messages and menu visibility for a secretary-style chat UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Provides a registry for navigation destinations with keyword lookup and action execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Temporarily stores proposal category in localStorage and exposes hooks to set/get it.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to approve or reject proposals and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks for fetching states, counties, and places with stable empty defaults and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWspBalance.ts: Fetches the caller's WSP token balance using identity-scoped React Query keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme and utility definitions implementing a teal-to-navy OKLCH design system.
frontend/src/lib/contributionActionTypes: Defines canonical contribution action type constants and exports them for UI use.
frontend/src/lib/earnedPointsToast.ts: Shows contribution point toasts with action‑specific copy, a lock to avoid duplicates, and optional totals from cache.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography fields into readable labels, parts, and strings, including population parsing and fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/formatTokenAmount.ts: Formats BigInt token amounts into display strings with optional decimal precision.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options, keyword-based lookup, and deep-link creation and parsing.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryReportIssueDat: Fetches geography details and top issues for reporting, combining backend lookups with friendly fallback messages.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryTopIssuesMessa: Retrieves and formats top issues for states, counties, and cities with clear user messaging and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralized UI copy strings for product text, navigation, actions, proposals, instance creation, and more.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Provides helpers to generate, validate, normalize, and parse WHISPER-prefixed geography-based instance names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin panel page that checks authentication/admin status and displays moderation tools and logs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Cont: Loads, filters, paginates, and displays admin contribution logs with actions for copying and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Renders a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and confirmation dialogs for moderation actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Toke: Admin UI for minting and burning WSP tokens with input validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder geography page with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/profile/components/St: Frontend-only staking settings with localStorage persistence and basic amount validation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Implements the user profile page with editing, image upload, profile saving, and contribution/points data handling.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/FlowEngineB: Implements the flow-engine-based SecretaryBrain with intent handling, geography support, and navigation hooks.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/hooks.ts: Utility helpers for composing and filtering flow event listeners for the Secretary brain.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/SecretaryBr: Defines the SecretaryBrain interface for handling user input, actions, view models, and flow events.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryCop: Static English copy strings for Secretary flows including menu, discovery, reporting, and slot prompts.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryPro: Prompt-building helpers for Secretary flows, generating dynamic messages for locations, issues, and slot filling.
frontend/src/secretary/decisions/secreta: Provides pure decision helpers for Secretary flow, determining next nodes based on context, geography, and input.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/flows.ts: Defines all Secretary flow nodes, their enter/exit behavior, and view-model outputs for the UI.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/runner.ts: Implements the state machine that processes actions, transitions between nodes, and emits flow events.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/types.ts: Declares core flow-engine types including nodes, transitions, context, actions, and view models.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRegist: Maps intents to their slot requirements and defines navigation hooks for intent completion.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRunner: Runs slot-filling for intents, generating prompts, updating slots, and triggering completion behavior.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyL: Performs backend-powered free-text US geography resolution, returning matched state, county, or place.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyN: Client-side text matching helpers to detect states, counties, and places from free text and extract the most specific geography.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/index.ts: Barrel file exporting all intent, flow, repair, and geography lookup utilities.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/intentClas: Rule-based classifier mapping normalized user text to predefined intents via keyword patterns.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/repair.ts: Detects correction cues in user text and identifies which slot to repair, then clears dependent slots.
Utilities for getting, setting, clearing, and checking slots, including dependent-slot reset logic.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/types.ts: Type definitions for intents, slots, slot bags, and intent context used across the Secretary system.
frontend/src/secretary/observability/sec: In-memory tracing utility for recording and querying small debug event histories.
frontend/src/secretary/state/secretaryCo: Manages the full Secretary conversation context and provides reset and message-handling helpers.
frontend/src/secretary/ui/secretaryViewM: Converts flow node models into UI-ready view instructions and exposes icon lookup.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Resolves asset and navigation paths correctly under variable base paths using Vite env settings.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements custom-event-based navigation signaling from Secretary flows to project views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters including hash-based routing and session persistence.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Provides a function that normalizes various backend error messages into concise, user-friendly English strings. It maps known patterns for authorization, geography, proposals, tasks, contributions, and token operations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using CSS variables. Includes plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for Phase 3 WSP token integration, listing existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes. Tracks the evolution of WSP tokenization, governance stubs, and UI updates.
